title: Rob Halford To Black Sabbath: Please Reunite With Bill Ward, I'll Be Headbanging In The Front Row! [News]
text:
Posted 13 hours ago 9 
Discussing Tony Iommi's statement he's still open for occasional one-offs with Black Sabbath and the guitarist's regret about not making it work with Bill Ward, Judas Priest frontman Rob Halford publicly invited fellow metal gods to reunite with the drummer, telling Eddie Trunk (transcribed by UG): 
"There's only one Black Sabbath, it'd be a shame to see them go a thousand percent." 
The singer added: "Wouldn't [a tour with Ward back in the band be amazing]? Behind the scenes, everybody's hustling for the best position and it sometimes stumbles and gets in the way of what really is a wonderful personal family relationship these guys have had for 50 years. 
"I, for one, would be there in the front row headbanging if ever there was a chance to see Bill Ward back in the band once again."
